de.payleven.payment

Interface RefundTask


  • public interface RefundTask
    Allows to make refunds of the previous payments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RefundResult startAndWait()
      Runs the task synchronously.
      void startAsync(RefundListener listener)
      Starts the task and runs it on a background thread.

    • Method Detail

      • startAsync

        void startAsync(RefundListener listener)
        Starts the task and runs it on a background thread. All callback methods of the listener will be called on the main thread. The task may be run only once. If you need to make the same refund, the new RefundTask must be created.
        Parameters:
        listener - handle callbacks when the task is completed
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the task is running or was run previously

      • startAndWait

        RefundResult startAndWait()
        Runs the task synchronously. Returns the refund result or throws an exception in case of an error.
        Throws:
        NetworkError - in case response from server wasn't received
        AuthorizationError - in case request fails because of invalid session token
        RefundError - in case request fails due to invalid refund params
        ServerError - in case server returns some non refund related error
        PaylevenError - in any other case
